statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -2 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
